message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its features and benefits, I'm asking for $14,500. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $13,500?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget concerns.  How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?  This product really is top-of-the-line and will exceed your expectations.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still looking to stay within my budget. Could we possibly agree on $13,800 for the product?
